articles.description: The Aston Martin name will return to F1 next year... and the Mercedes team principal has invested in the company. What does Toto Wolff's stake mean? Mark Hughes has the answer.

articles.title: The most-needed F1 2019 changes to improve Virtual GPs - RaceFans
articles.description: How should F1 2019 change to improve the Virtual GPs? Spectator Mode refinements need to take priority over handling or circuit changes, says Will Wood.
